message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond quickly.
Alice, thanks for the offer.  While your product looks great, I'm working with a tight budget. I could do $800,000.
Hello Bob, I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. How about $850,000 for the product?
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $825,000 is the best I can do.  Let me know if that works.
Bob, thank you for your response. Considering our costs and the value of the product, I am willing to agree on $840,000 for the product.
Alice, this is getting close.  Can we split the difference at $832,500 and call it a deal?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Considering our costs and the market value, I am willing to agree on $837,500 for the product.
